description: Jenna was relieved when her boyfriend, a U.S. Special Forces soldier, told her he was deploying to Africa, rather than to a war zone like Iraq or Afghanistan. When he was killed in an ambush in Niger, she was left with the fragments of their imagined future.
title: What a Soldier Killed in Niger Left Behind
title_page: What a Soldier Killed in Niger Left Behind - Video - NYTimes.com
